entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
